get.summary: Get a list of covariate settings

CovariateSettings.description: Object to hold covariate settings for use with FeatureExtraction v2.1.5

DemographicsAge.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in years). (analysis ID 2)

DemographicsAgeGroup.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in 5 year age groups) (analysis ID 3)

DemographicsIndexYear.description: Year of the index date. (analysis ID 6)

DemographicsIndexMonth.description: Month of the index date. (analysis ID 7)

DemographicsPriorObservationTime.description: Number of continuous days of observation time preceding the index date. (analysis ID 8)

DemographicsPostObservationTime.description: Number of continuous days of observation time following the index date. (analysis ID 9)

DemographicsTimeInCohort.description: Number of days of observation time during cohort period. (analysis ID 10)

DemographicsIndexYearMonth.description: Both calendar year and month of the index date in a single variable. (analysis ID 11)

ConditionOccurrenceAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting any time prior to index. (analysis ID 101)

ConditionOccurrenceLongTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 102)

ConditionOccurrenceMediumTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 103)

ConditionOccurrenceShortTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 104)

ConditionOccurrencePrimaryInpatientAnyTi.description: One covariate per condition observed in an inpatient setting in the condition_occurrence table starting any time prior to index. (analysis ID 105)

ConditionOccurrencePrimaryInpatientLongT.description: One covariate per condition observed in an inpatient setting in the condition_occurrence table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 106)

ConditionOccurrencePrimaryInpatientMediu.description: One covariate per condition observed in an inpatient setting in the condition_occurrence table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 107)

ConditionOccurrencePrimaryInpatientShort.description: One covariate per condition observed in an inpatient setting in the condition_occurrence table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 108)

ConditionEraAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table overlapping with any time prior to index. (analysis ID 201)

ConditionEraLongTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window. (analysis ID 202)

ConditionEraMediumTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the medium term window. (analysis ID 203)

ConditionEraShortTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the short term window. (analysis ID 204)

ConditionEraOverlapping.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table overlapping with the end of the risk window. (analysis ID 205)

ConditionEraStartLongTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 206)

ConditionEraStartMediumTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 207)

ConditionEraStartShortTerm.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 208)

ConditionGroupEraAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any time prior to index. (analysis ID 209)

ConditionGroupEraLongTerm.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window. (analysis ID 210)

ConditionGroupEraMediumTerm.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the medium term window. (analysis ID 211)

ConditionGroupEraShortTerm.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the short term window. (analysis ID 212)

ConditionGroupEraOverlapping.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with the end of the risk window. (analysis ID 213)

ConditionGroupEraStartLongTerm.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 214)

ConditionGroupEraStartMediumTerm.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 215)

ConditionGroupEraStartShortTerm.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 216)

DrugExposureAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting any time prior to index. (analysis ID 301)

DrugExposureLongTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 302)

DrugExposureMediumTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 303)

DrugExposureShortTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 304)

DrugEraAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table overlapping with any time prior to index. (analysis ID 401)

DrugEraLongTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window. (analysis ID 402)

DrugEraMediumTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the medium term window. (analysis ID 403)

DrugEraShortTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the short window. (analysis ID 404)

DrugEraOverlapping.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table overlapping with the end of the risk window. (analysis ID 405)

DrugEraStartLongTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 406)

DrugEraStartMediumTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 407)

DrugEraStartShortTerm.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table starting in the long short window. (analysis ID 408)

DrugGroupEraAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any time prior to index. (analysis ID 409)

DrugGroupEraLongTerm.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window. (analysis ID 410)

DrugGroupEraMediumTerm.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the medium term window. (analysis ID 411)

DrugGroupEraShortTerm.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the short term window. (analysis ID 412)

DrugGroupEraOverlapping.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with the end of the risk window. (analysis ID 413)

DrugGroupEraStartLongTerm.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 414)

DrugGroupEraStartMediumTerm.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 415)

DrugGroupEraStartShortTerm.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 416)

ProcedureOccurrenceAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per procedure in the procedure_occurrence table any time prior to index. (analysis ID 501)

ProcedureOccurrenceLongTerm.description: One covariate per procedure in the procedure_occurrence table in the long term window. (analysis ID 502)

ProcedureOccurrenceMediumTerm.description: One covariate per procedure in the procedure_occurrence table in the medium term window. (analysis ID 503)

ProcedureOccurrenceShortTerm.description: One covariate per procedure in the procedure_occurrence table in the short term window. (analysis ID 504)

DeviceExposureAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per device in the device exposure table starting any time prior to index. (analysis ID 601)

DeviceExposureLongTerm.description: One covariate per device in the device exposure table starting in the long term window. (analysis ID 602)

DeviceExposureMediumTerm.description: One covariate per device in the device exposure table starting in the medium term window. (analysis ID 603)

DeviceExposureShortTerm.description: One covariate per device in the device exposure table starting in the short term window. (analysis ID 604)

MeasurementAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per measurement in the measurement table any time prior to index. (analysis ID 701)

MeasurementLongTerm.description: One covariate per measurement in the measurement table in the long term window. (analysis ID 702)

MeasurementMediumTerm.description: One covariate per measurement in the measurement table in the medium term window. (analysis ID 703)

MeasurementShortTerm.description: One covariate per measurement in the measurement table in the short term window. (analysis ID 704)

MeasurementValueAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate containing the value per measurement-unit combination any time prior to index. (analysis ID 705)

MeasurementValueLongTerm.description: One covariate containing the value per measurement-unit combination in the long term window. (analysis ID 706)

MeasurementValueMediumTerm.description: One covariate containing the value per measurement-unit combination in the medium term window. (analysis ID 707)

MeasurementValueShortTerm.description: One covariate containing the value per measurement-unit combination in the short term window. (analysis ID 708)

MeasurementRangeGroupAnyTimePrior.description: Covariates indicating whether measurements are below, within, or above normal range any time prior to index. (analysis ID 709)

MeasurementRangeGroupLongTerm.description: Covariates indicating whether measurements are below, within, or above normal range in the long term window. (analysis ID 710)

MeasurementRangeGroupMediumTerm.description: Covariates indicating whether measurements are below, within, or above normal range in the medium term window. (analysis ID 711)

MeasurementRangeGroupShortTerm.description: Covariates indicating whether measurements are below, within, or above normal range in the short term window. (analysis ID 712)

ObservationAnyTimePrior.description: One covariate per observation in the observation table any time prior to index. (analysis ID 801)

ObservationLongTerm.description: One covariate per observation in the observation table in the long term window. (analysis ID 802)

ObservationMediumTerm.description: One covariate per observation in the observation table in the medium term window. (analysis ID 803)

ObservationShortTerm.description: One covariate per observation in the observation table in the short term window. (analysis ID 804)

CharlsonIndex.description: The Charlson comorbidity index (Romano adaptation) using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 901)

Dcsi.description: The Diabetes Comorbidity Severity Index (DCSI) using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 902)

Chads2.description: The CHADS2 score using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 903)

Chads2Vasc.description: The CHADS2VASc score using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 904)

DistinctConditionCountLongTerm.description: The number of distinct condition concepts observed in the long term window. (analysis ID 905)

DistinctConditionCountMediumTerm.description: The number of distinct condition concepts observed in the medium term window. (analysis ID 906)

DistinctConditionCountShortTerm.description: The number of distinct condition concepts observed in the short term window. (analysis ID 907)

DistinctIngredientCountLongTerm.description: The number of distinct ingredients observed in the long term window. (analysis ID 908)

DistinctIngredientCountMediumTerm.description: The number of distinct ingredients observed in the medium term window. (analysis ID 909)

DistinctIngredientCountShortTerm.description: The number of distinct ingredients observed in the short term window. (analysis ID 910)

DistinctProcedureCountLongTerm.description: The number of distinct procedures observed in the long term window. (analysis ID 911)

DistinctProcedureCountMediumTerm.description: The number of distinct procedures observed in the medium term window. (analysis ID 912)

DistinctProcedureCountShortTerm.description: The number of distinct procedures observed in the short term window. (analysis ID 913)

DistinctMeasurementCountLongTerm.description: The number of distinct measurements observed in the long term window. (analysis ID 914)

DistinctMeasurementCountMediumTerm.description: The number of distinct measurements observed in the medium term window. (analysis ID 915)

DistinctMeasurementCountShortTerm.description: The number of distinct measurements observed in the short term window. (analysis ID 916)

DistinctObservationCountLongTerm.description: The number of distinct observations observed in the long term window. (analysis ID 917)

DistinctObservationCountMediumTerm.description: The number of distinct observations observed in the medium term window. (analysis ID 918)

DistinctObservationCountShortTerm.description: The number of distinct observations observed in the short term window. (analysis ID 919)

VisitCountLongTerm.description: The number of visits observed in the long term window. (analysis ID 920)

VisitCountMediumTerm.description: The number of visits observed in the medium term window. (analysis ID 921)

VisitCountShortTerm.description: The number of visits observed in the short term window. (analysis ID 922)

VisitConceptCountLongTerm.description: The number of visits observed in the long term window, stratified by visit concept ID. (analysis ID 923)

VisitConceptCountMediumTerm.description: The number of visits observed in the medium term window, stratified by visit concept ID. (analysis ID 924)

VisitConceptCountShortTerm.description: The number of visits observed in the short term window, stratified by visit concept ID. (analysis ID 925)

longTermStartDays.description: What is the start day (relative to the index date) of the long-term window?

mediumTermStartDays.description: What is the start day (relative to the index date) of the medium-term window?

shortTermStartDays.description: What is the start day (relative to the index date) of the short-term window?

endDays.description: What is the end day (relative to the index date) of the window?

includedCovariateConceptIds.description: A list of concept IDs that should be d to construct covariates.

addDescendantsToInclude.description: Should descendant concept IDs be added to the list of concepts to include?

excludedCovariateConceptIds.description: A list of concept IDs that should NOT be d to construct covariates.

addDescendantsToExclude.description: Should descendant concept IDs be added to the list of concepts to exclude?

includedCovariateIds.description: A list of covariate IDs that should be restricted to.

TemporalCovariateSettings.description: Object to hold temporal covariate settings for use with FeatureExtraction v2.1.5

DemographicsAge.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in years). (analysis ID 2)

DemographicsAgeGroup.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in 5 year age groups) (analysis ID 3)

DemographicsIndexYear.description: Year of the index date. (analysis ID 6)

DemographicsIndexMonth.description: Month of the index date. (analysis ID 7)

DemographicsPriorObservationTime.description: Number of days of observation time preceding the index date. (analysis ID 8)

DemographicsPostObservationTime.description: Number of days of observation time preceding the index date. (analysis ID 9)

DemographicsTimeInCohort.description: Number of days of observation time preceding the index date. (analysis ID 10)

DemographicsIndexYearMonth.description: Calendar month of the index date. (analysis ID 11)

ConditionOccurrence.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_occurrence table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 101)

ConditionOccurrencePrimaryInpatient.description: One covariate per condition observed as a primary diagnosis in an inpatient setting in the condition_occurrence table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 102)

ConditionEraStart.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 201)

ConditionEraOverlap.description: One covariate per condition in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the time window. (analysis ID 202)

ConditionEraGroupStart.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to SNOMED groups in the condition_era table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 203)

ConditionEraGroupOverlap.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to SNOMED groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the time window. (analysis ID 203)

DrugExposure.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_exposure table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 301)

DrugEraStart.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 401)

DrugEraOverlap.description: One covariate per drug in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the time window.(analysis ID 402)

DrugEraGroupStart.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table starting in the time window.(analysis ID 403)

DrugEraGroupOverlap.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the time window. (analysis ID 403)

ProcedureOccurrence.description: One covariate per procedure in the procedure_occurrence table in the time window. (analysis ID 501)

DeviceExposure.description: One covariate per device in the device exposure table starting in the time window. (analysis ID 601)

Measurement.description: One covariate per measurement in the measurement table in the time window. (analysis ID 701)

MeasurementValue.description: One covariate containing the value per measurement-unit combination in the time window. If multiple values are found, the last is taken.(analysis ID 702)

MeasurementRangeGroup.description: Covariates indicating whether measurements are below, within, or above normal range within the time period. (analysis ID 703)

Observation.description: One covariate per observation in the observation table in the time window. (analysis ID 801)

CharlsonIndex.description: The Charlson comorbidity index (Romano adaptation) using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 901)

Dcsi.description: The Diabetes Comorbidity Severity Index (DCSI) using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 902)

Chads2.description: The CHADS2 score using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 903)

Chads2Vasc.description: The CHADS2VASc score using all conditions prior to the window end. (analysis ID 904)

DistinctConditionCount.description: The number of distinct condition concepts observed in the time window. (analysis ID 905)

DistinctIngredientCount.description: The number of distinct ingredients observed in the time window. (analysis ID 906)

DistinctProcedureCount.description: The number of distinct procedures observed in the time window. (analysis ID 907)

DistinctMeasurementCount.description: The number of distinct measurements observed in the time window. (analysis ID 908)

DistinctObservationCount.description: The number of distinct observations in the time window. (analysis ID 909)

VisitCount.description: The number of visits observed in the time window. (analysis ID 910)

VisitConceptCount.description: The number of visits observed in the time window, stratified by visit concept ID. (analysis ID 911)

temporalStartDays.description: A list of integers representing the start of a time period, relative to the index date. 0 indicates the index date, -1 indicates the day before the index date, etc. The start day is included in the time period.

temporalEndDays.description: A list of integers representing the end of a time period, relative to the index date. 0 indicates the index date, -1 indicates the day before the index date, etc. The end day is included in the time period.

includedCovariateConceptIds.description: A list of concept IDs that should be used to construct covariates.

addDescendantsToInclude.description: Should descendant concept IDs be added to the list of concepts to include?

excludedCovariateConceptIds.description: A list of concept IDs that should NOT be used to construct covariates.

addDescendantsToExclude.description: Should descendant concept IDs be added to the list of concepts to exclude?

includedCovariateIds.description: A list of covariate IDs that should be restricted to.
